trans-unit.source: Plan a Machine Learning advanced analytics environment | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Plan a Machine Learning advanced analytics environment | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Plan your advanced analytics environment by considering key questions.
trans-unit.target: Plan your advanced analytics environment by considering key questions.

trans-unit.source: Plan your Azure Machine Learning advanced analytics environment
trans-unit.target: Plan your Azure Machine Learning advanced analytics environment

trans-unit.source: What scenario matches your analytics problem when you are getting ready to set up an environment to do advanced analytics with Azure Machine Learning?
trans-unit.target: What scenario matches your analytics problem when you are getting ready to set up an environment to do advanced analytics with Azure Machine Learning?

trans-unit.source: The choices you make regarding the resources that are needed are based on the type, size, and source location of your data and the target destination for this data.
trans-unit.target: The choices you make regarding the resources that are needed are based on the type, size, and source location of your data and the target destination for this data.

trans-unit.source: This article discusses those questions that will help you identify your scenario.
trans-unit.target: This article discusses those questions that will help you identify your scenario.

trans-unit.source: Once you have identified the relevant scenario, the Advanced Analytics Process and Technology (ADAPT) workflow that is presented in the <link><linkText>Learning Path: Build advanced analytics solutions in Azure</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Once you have identified the relevant scenario, the Advanced Analytics Process and Technology (ADAPT) workflow that is presented in the <link><linkText>Learning Path: Build advanced analytics solutions in Azure</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: steps your through a series of tasks, from obtaining a dataset through the creation and publishing of a model as an Azure web service that applications can consume.
trans-unit.target: steps your through a series of tasks, from obtaining a dataset through the creation and publishing of a model as an Azure web service that applications can consume.

trans-unit.source: This topic also enumerates some of the resources and tools that are used by this advanced analytics process.
trans-unit.target: This topic also enumerates some of the resources and tools that are used by this advanced analytics process.

trans-unit.source: Answer these questions
trans-unit.target: Answer these questions

trans-unit.source: Answer these questions to determine what scenario you are working with before you create your advanced analytics environment.
trans-unit.target: Answer these questions to determine what scenario you are working with before you create your advanced analytics environment.

trans-unit.source: Where is your data located? (This location is referred to as the *data source*.)
trans-unit.target: Where is your data located? (This location is referred to as the *data source*.)

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: The data is publicly available at an HTTP address.
trans-unit.target: The data is publicly available at an HTTP address.

trans-unit.source: The data resides in a local/network file location.
trans-unit.target: The data resides in a local/network file location.

trans-unit.source: The data is in a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: The data is in a SQL Server database.

trans-unit.source: The data is stored in an Azure storage container
trans-unit.target: The data is stored in an Azure storage container

trans-unit.source: How is your data formatted? For example:
trans-unit.target: How is your data formatted? For example:

trans-unit.source: Comma-separated or tab-separated files, uncompressed.
trans-unit.target: Comma-separated or tab-separated files, uncompressed.

trans-unit.source: Comma-separated or tab-separated files, compressed.
trans-unit.target: Comma-separated or tab-separated files, compressed.

trans-unit.source: Compressed or uncompressed Azure blobs.
trans-unit.target: Compressed or uncompressed Azure blobs.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server tables.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server tables.

trans-unit.source: How large is your data?
trans-unit.target: How large is your data?

trans-unit.source: Small: Less than 2GB
trans-unit.target: Small: Less than 2GB

trans-unit.source: Medium: Greater than 2GB and less than 10GB
trans-unit.target: Medium: Greater than 2GB and less than 10GB

trans-unit.source: Large: Greater than 10GB
trans-unit.target: Large: Greater than 10GB

trans-unit.source: Very large: 100s of GBs
trans-unit.target: Very large: 100s of GBs

trans-unit.source: How familiar are you with the data?
trans-unit.target: How familiar are you with the data?

trans-unit.source: Do you need to explore the data to discover its schema, variable distributions, missing values, etcetera?
trans-unit.target: Do you need to explore the data to discover its schema, variable distributions, missing values, etcetera?

trans-unit.source: Does the data require pre-processing or cleaning before it can be transformed into a tabular representation?
trans-unit.target: Does the data require pre-processing or cleaning before it can be transformed into a tabular representation?

trans-unit.source: Do you plan (or are you able) to move all of the data to Azure storage?
trans-unit.target: Do you plan (or are you able) to move all of the data to Azure storage?

trans-unit.source: Yes, planning to copy the whole dataset to the cloud for processing.
trans-unit.target: Yes, planning to copy the whole dataset to the cloud for processing.

trans-unit.source: No, only a subset of the data will be copied to Azure.
trans-unit.target: No, only a subset of the data will be copied to Azure.

trans-unit.source: What is your preferred Azure cloud destination? For example:
trans-unit.target: What is your preferred Azure cloud destination? For example:

trans-unit.source: Move data to Azure storage blobs.
trans-unit.target: Move data to Azure storage blobs.

trans-unit.source: Store data in mountable Azure virtual hard disks.
trans-unit.target: Store data in mountable Azure virtual hard disks.

trans-unit.source: Load data to an SQL Server database on an Azure Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: Load data to an SQL Server database on an Azure Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: Map data to Azure HDInsight Hive tables.
trans-unit.target: Map data to Azure HDInsight Hive tables.

trans-unit.source: What is your scenario?
trans-unit.target: What is your scenario?

trans-unit.source: Once you have answered the questions in the previous section, you are ready to determine which scenario best fits your case.
trans-unit.target: Once you have answered the questions in the previous section, you are ready to determine which scenario best fits your case.

trans-unit.source: The sample scenarios are outlined in <link><linkText>Scenarios for advanced analytics in Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The sample scenarios are outlined in <link><linkText>Scenarios for advanced analytics in Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Advanced analytics resources in Azure
trans-unit.target: Advanced analytics resources in Azure

trans-unit.source: Depending on your scenario, you might need some of the following tools and resources.
trans-unit.target: Depending on your scenario, you might need some of the following tools and resources.

trans-unit.target: Azure Tools:

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure PowerShell SDK</linkText><title></title></link>,

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Storage Explorer</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>AzCopy</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>AzCopy</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.target: Azure Virtual Machines running SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight (Hadoop)
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight (Hadoop)

trans-unit.source: Azure Virtual Networks for on-prem to Azure file sharing
trans-unit.target: Azure Virtual Networks for on-prem to Azure file sharing

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory for scheduled data movement
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory for scheduled data movement
